How do I know that my money’s secure?
Matbia and all of its operations are overseen by a nonpartisan board of professionals well-versed in philanthropy and its legalities. The board’s esteemed trustees supply knowledge and guidance in each step our company takes. Matbia’s tax advisory is the acclaimed Phillip M Stern & Co. LLP, who audit our organization annually.
